question:
Question: you are due to start a new job next week but you will not be able to because you have some problems.

writ a letter to your employer. in your letter

--explain your situation

--describe your problems

--tell him/her when you think you can start
text: Hope my letter finds you well.
I am writing this letter to let you know that I will be unable to commence  my new job this coming Monday. I need to be in the hospital 24/7, thus, I cannot work.

Please be informed that there is an emergency at home that I need to resolve right away. It is a family matter, my mother is in the hospital right now due to successive bleeding and an operation is a must. Furthermore, I need to be there to look after her and to make  sure that everything is fine. Kindly note that we do not have any relatives here, therefore, I am the only person that she can rely on.
Please note that I will be available to start next week after week. Apologies for the inconvenience that I cause  your company.
Should you have any concerns regarding my letter, please feel free to send an email.
Thank you for your kind understanding.
